name: trailtag-extension
description: Test scaffold for TrailTag Chrome Extension (Jest) - Use 'npm run scripts:help' for available commands

scripts.copy:static: mkdir -p ../../dist/extension && (if [ -d dist_ts ] && [ "$(ls -A dist_ts)" ]; then cp -R dist_ts/* ../../dist/extension/; fi) && cp -R manifest.json assets vendor README.md background.js content.js ../../dist/extension/ && cp ui/components/popup.html ../../dist/extension/ && cp ui/styles/main.css ../../dist/extension/styles.css && cp config/popup.bootstrap.mjs ../../dist/extension/ && if [ -e src/utils/map-optimizer.js ]; then cp src/utils/map-optimizer.js ../../dist/extension/map-optimization.js; fi && if [ ! -e dist_ts/service_worker.js ] && [ -e service_worker.js ]; then cp -R service_worker.js ../../dist/extension/; fi && mkdir -p ../../dist/extension/node_modules/leaflet.markercluster/dist && cp -R node_modules/leaflet.markercluster/dist/* ../../dist/extension/node_modules/leaflet.markercluster/dist/ && rm -rf ../../dist/extension/__tests__
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run inject:config && npm run ts:build && npm run copy:static
scripts.zip: npm run build && (cd ../../dist && zip -r extension.zip extension)
